body: An Aqueduct brings water from alpine lakes and rivers to lowland cities where water is scarce or insufficient for the local populace. A finished series of Aqueduct hexes must connect to a hill or mountain hex (with a river or lake) on one end and a settlement on the other end; otherwise, you do not gain its benefit.
name: Aqueduct*
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Terrain Improvements/Aqueduct*

sections.body: One end must be hill or mountain hex; can pass through any type of hex.
sections.name: Terrain

sections.body: Loyalty+1, Stability +1, allows settlement to build water-dependent buildings.
sections.name: Effect

sections.body: As a Road, except the cost is not doubled for hexes with rivers (see the Terrain and Terrain Improvements table).
